CustomField.description: Due date on the invoice that will be passed to Quickbooks This equals 'Invoice Date' field + 'Payment Terms' Field Can be updated as needed. Update this from Salesforce; not Quickbooks, as it will be pushed to Quickbooks via Breadwinner
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Due date on the invoice that will be passed to Quickbooks This equals 'Invoice Date' field + 'Payment Terms' Field Can be updated as needed. Update this from Salesforce; not Quickbooks, as it will be pushed to Quickbooks via Breadwinner
CustomField.label: Invoice Due Date
